LanguageData.FT_Concrete.label: concrete path
LanguageData.FT_Concrete.description: Easy to lay, but ugly to look at.
LanguageData.FT_ConcreteTile.label: concrete tile
LanguageData.FT_ConcreteTile.description: Concrete tiles. Cheap, but neutral in terms of looks and slow to build.
LanguageData.FT_FineConcreteTile.label: fine concrete tile
LanguageData.FT_FineConcreteTile.description: Exquisite tiles made using architectural concerete, for expressing economic status. Slow to construct.
LanguageData.FT_FlagstoneConcrete.label: concrete flagstone
LanguageData.FT_TileStoneConcrete.label: concrete tile
LanguageData.FT_PlankFloor.label: Wood-like concrete floor
LanguageData.FT_PlankFloor.description: Fiber concrete made to imitate natural wood for that warm, homey feeling. Quick to lay, while being non-flammable.
